subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: At 35, the German tennis star is heading to his 14th Wimbledon, hoping to keep imposing his will and his true all-court game on the increasingly younger men across the net.
snippet: At 35, the German tennis star is heading to his 14th Wimbledon, hoping to keep imposing his will and his true all-court game on the increasingly younger men across the net.
